Reporter: Louis Cai
OS:  Windows2003 standand edition & RHEL gtk 3.0
Language: CHS/KOR
Build level: 20040422_0915(wswb-I20040422-200404231600)
JDK Version: IBM JDK 1.4.2 Beta
Test case #:    
Summary: Error message box will popup after importing Log file.
Description:
Steps to recreate problem:
1. File->Import-> Log file.
2. Click "Add" the "Add Log File" dialog opens.
3. Select "Apache Http Access Log" for the type of the log file.
4. On the Details page browse for the "Access log file path" and select the 
provided test log file apache_access.log.
5. Click "OK"
6. Repeat steps 2-5 selecting in step 3 "Apache Http Error Log" and in step 4 
the provided test log file apache_error.log, click Finish. 
<<Error>>   
         Error message box will popup after importing Log file.
<<Expected Result>>
         No Error message box will popup after importing Log file.

Alex, please take a look at this problem

I cannot reproduce the problem with the latest code on cvs using the log files 
attached.

sorry, i just retry again and got the same erro and seeing the following error 
in console:

org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.LogParserException: "C:\Documents and 
Settings\ewchan\Desktop\apache_access.log" is not a valid access log file.
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.AbstractAccessLogParser.parseNext
(AbstractAccessLogParser.java:210)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.config.sensors.StaticParserSensor.getNext
(StaticParserSensor.java:227)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.BasicContext.run
(BasicContext.java:100)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:566)

It seems like the log file is not a valid one. I tired with other log file and 
the import runs fine. please try the log I attached

Paul, as discussed can you please take a look at this defect. I don't think 
it's a defect, maybe the error message is a little bit misleading.

This defect is the result of CGI debug data in both log files.  Although CGI 
debug is illegal in an Apache access log file, we will modify the static log 
parsers to graceful handle this type of log file data.
Code checked-in on April 27. 2004 to HEAD.

We still found this defect on the build IES-3.0-20040427, so reopen it. Please 
check it, thanks.

This defect has been fixed in the HEAD stream on April 27, 2004.  The IES-3.0-
20040427 build does not contain this fix since it is not using a current 
snapshot of the HEAD stream.

The IES-3.0-20040427 build contains the Hyades 3.0.0_20040422_0915 build which 
does not contain this fix.

Hi Paul,
The previous problems which will popup two error message boxes is fixed, but 
there is still one error message box will popup. So reopen it. Please see the 
new attached picture. Thanks.
